headline: Caterpillar stock downgraded by Evercore ISI on Trump win
summary: Caterpillar (CAT) shares are trading lower after Evercore ISI downgraded the heavy equipment manufacturer to Underperform from In Line. The investment firm cites potential headwinds from Donald Trump's second presidential term as a key factor in its more bearish outlook for the company's stock. Market Domination Hosts Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton break down the details. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. This post was written by Angel Smith

headline: Industrials and Machinery ratings adjusted at Evercore post-election
summary: Investing.com -- Evercore ISI revised its ratings for several industrial and machinery stocks following the US election results, citing a more optimistic business outlook tied to the anticipated "pro-business Trump" policies.
